docs.title: Welcome to ZooBerry Docs
docs.text: ZooBerry Docs is a reference and tutorial site for Zoo Tycoon 1 modders. Our site offers detailed information on game configuration files and modding tutorials. Whether you're adjusting game settings or creating new content, our resources are designed to support modders at all levels. Explore ZooBerry Docs for the tools and knowledge you need to enhance your Zoo Tycoon 1 experience.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
